extendedInfo.description: This is the FREE version of the app that gives you over 25 free secret Starbucks Drinks! See the full version for Over 75 drinks Secret Starbucks Drinks!Starbucks secret menu is finally available to everyone! Ever wonder what a "Zebra Mocha" is? How about a "Dirty Chai"? These are 2 of the secret drinks that are known only to a few Starbucks insiders. This app has over 25 secret drink recipes that can be made at Starbucks. Everything Starbucks has to offer from banana splits to raspberry passion teas. We made this app so that you can finally try these delicious drinks!Rather than asking for the drinks by name, this app will show the barista taking your order the exact instructions how to make each drink. These drinks are SECRET there a on a hidden menu!! So not all Starbucks Employees know how to make each drink.Don't settle for the same old coffee fix, don't settle for the same old cup, magic blends make tasty Coffee and Tea Creations.  Its simple, fast and efficient, and has 2 separate ordering methods in case you are in a drive-through Starbucks location or want an alternative ordering method. This app does not act as a paying method like starbucks card mobile app does. It shows the barista how to make the drink in the exact way it should be made!Hidden menu Secret Drinks is an independently developed application from JRG Software. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Starbucks Corporation. These drinks are not made up by Starbucks Corporation.

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I\'ve always been a fan of marble mocha macchiato, so glad I can find more hidden menu drinks!! Perfect app fot coffee lovers!
reviews.author: Emily Chen

reviews.title: Good start,  but needs work.
reviews.comment: This it\'s a fun app that attempts to bring to Starbucks e variety of flavors available previously in only independent coffee houses.  But there are only a few free drink ideas... they require us to purchase the full app to get more.  But the first thing THEY REALLY need to fix is sizes. Starbucks doesn\'t have small,  medium and large.  They have short,  tall,  Grande and venti (plus the two secret sizes on each end of the Range). That is a basic detail they need to get right first!  Fun idea.
reviews.author: Robin Loreth

reviews.title: Must be a sbux partner
reviews.comment: Recipes are correct, but nobody will pay for an app of recipes found online for free. Or, maybe they will....
reviews.author: Chris Crater

reviews.title: Not worth 1 star!!
reviews.comment: DO NOT download this app!I assure you it will only be a waste of space.You can easily access far better descriptions of ALL the secret drinks online.
reviews.author: Candis Neblett

reviews.title: Needs ingredients listed
reviews.comment: A Starbucks associate told me that in order for me to order from the secret menu that I need to tell them the ingredients -- otherwise they wouldn\'t make it for me. Luckily another girl was actually nice enough to make for me anyways.
reviews.author: Eric Cheng

reviews.title: smart
reviews.comment: although still need to prove the app stabality, it is a good and smart apo.
reviews.author: Wenbo Sun

reviews.title: Loved it
reviews.comment: Super helpful and now when ever I go I get something new
reviews.author: Lux Meacham

reviews.title: Best kept secret for coffee lovers!
reviews.author: Heather Walsh

reviews.title: This is no secret
reviews.comment: Lol this app and the website trips me out.. Nothing is secret customers are only uninformed about what Starbucks offers.. Smh..
reviews.author: Jasmine De\'Shaye

reviews.title: Nothing very secret
reviews.comment: These are all pretty standard drinks in the coffee world. Any barista with some respect for their job will know this stuff
reviews.author: CJ Zethof

reviews.comment: Not much of what I looking forward to having. Very sad
reviews.author: Emily Sam
